meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unmitigated
meanings.sent1: The unmitigatednesses of his anger was evident in his harsh words.
meanings.sent2: The unmitigatednesses of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigatednesses of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The unmitigatednesses of the problem required a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigatednesses of his determination was unmatched by anyone else.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is unmitigated
meanings.sent1: The unmitigatednesses of his failure was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: The unmitigatednesses of the heat made it unbearable to be outside.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigatednesses of his excitement was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The unmitigatednesses of the situation demanded immediate action.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigatednesses of her beauty was breathtaking.
